original_title: Bhoutan, un petit pays possédé du ciel
overview: A discovery of Bhutan, a tiny landlocked country in the Himalayas. An approach to its economy, one of the few on this planet that can pride itself on its self-sufficiency. A meeting with its people, characterized by their religiousness and their incredible propensity to happiness.
title: Bhoutan, un petit pays possédé du ciel
